bug.author: iamyangjh
bug.summary: Unable to import 'pandas_profiling.utils.cache' when executing the examples/census/census.py file
bug.description: Unable to import 'pandas_profiling.utils.cache' in the examples/census/census.py To Reproduce After installation, try to execute the examples/census/census.py in the python client, it will get the error message: Traceback (most recent call last): File "census.py", line 7, in from pandas_profiling.utils.cache import cache_file ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'pandas_profiling.utils.cache' Version information: panda_profiling: 2.4.0 python: 3.7.4 Additional context

comments.comment: I guess I found the problem. I installed the version 2.4.0. The "examples/census/census.py" I am using is in the master branch. After rebuilding and re-install the new version, it works.
